title: Is memorising 10 styles of Qirat of Quran more in reward than memorising only 1 style Assim alhakeem
transcript: from Qatar so now are you Allah we know that the companion of the Quran will be told to recite understand as you're certain in the world so someone memorized the dankara at then will they Shankle the same level as someone who memorized only one Kara such as hapson aksim this is something only Allah azzawajal can answer it I have no knowledge of it and we don't have any proof from the Quran or from the Sunnah that states that they differ it states that recite and Ascend as you used to recite in the Dunya for your last level is at the last Ayah so if the guy memorizes the whole Quran then his last level would be the full and and the top not necessarily in different that he would be higher or not this is something only in Allah's knowledge and Allah azzawajal Knows Best
